item.title: Chapter 4 Homework
item.description: Thurs, 2017-09-28: Do four exercises: 4.2.{2,4}, 4.3.1, and 4.4.1. Fri, 2017-09-29: Read section 4.5 so you can use check-expect. Mon, 2017-10-02: Chapter 4 Additional Exercises, problems 1 and 2. Tues, 2017-10-03: Chapter 4 Additional Exercises, problems 3–6. Learned how to boot lab computers into Linux; use that if they are too slow with Windows. Wed, 2017-10-04: Non AC only - TBA Thurs, 2017-10-05: Chapter 6.
